00101 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00102 #define __func__ __FUNCTION__

00104 
00105 //
00106 // null pointer safety
00107 //
00108 #define CHK_LOG(title,comment) printf ("%s function: %s comment: %s", title, __func__, comment);
00109 //
00110 #define CHK_NUL_RET_RET(reference,comment) if ((reference) == NULL) \
00111         { CHK_LOG("CHK_NUL_RET_RET;",comment); return; }
00112 //
00113 #define CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(reference,comment) if ((reference) == NULL) \
00114         { CHK_LOG("CHK_NUL_RET_NUL;",comment); return NULL; }
00115 //
00116 #define CHK_NUL_RET_FLS(reference,comment) if ((reference) == NULL) \
00117         { CHK_LOG("CHK_NUL_RET_FLS;",comment); return false; }
00118 //
00119 #define CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(reference,comment) if ((reference) == NULL) \
00120         { CHK_LOG("CHK_NUL_RET_ERR;",comment); return JNI_ERR; }
00121 //
00122 // c++ <-> java, bool <-> boolean conversions
00123 #define BOOL(x) (((x) == JNI_TRUE) ? true : false) // from java to c++
00124 #define BOOLEAN(x) ((jboolean) ( ((x) == true) ? JNI_TRUE : JNI_FALSE )) // from c++ to java
00125 //
00126 // free/malloc convenience
00127 #define FREE(x) if ((x) != NULL) { free(x); x = NULL; }
00128 #define MALLOC(var,type,size) type* var = (type*) malloc(sizeof(type) * size);
00129 
00130 // declare unused explicitly or else see compiler warnings
00131 #define UNUSED(x) ((void)(x))

00146 inline bool X_IsInRange(jlong min, jlong var, jlong max) {
00147         if (min <= var && var <= max) {
00148                 return true;
00149         } else {
00150                 return false;
00151         }
00152 }
00153 
00154 inline void X_ConvertMillisIntoTimeValue(const jlong millisTimeout,
00155                 timeval* timeValue) {
00156         if (millisTimeout < 0) { // infinite wait
00157                 timeValue->tv_sec = INT_MAX;
00158                 timeValue->tv_usec = 0;
00159         } else if (millisTimeout > 0) { // finite wait
00160                 timeValue->tv_sec = millisTimeout / 1000; // msvc C4244
00161                 timeValue->tv_usec = (millisTimeout % 1000) * 1000;
00162         } else { // immediate return (not less the UDT event slice of 10 ms)
00163                 timeValue->tv_sec = 0;
00164                 timeValue->tv_usec = 0;
00165         }
00166 }
